body:

comments.body: Java SDK v1.23.0 is very old, can you produce this bug on the latest release [v1.32.0](https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-java/releases/tag/v1.32.0)?
Closing due to no response, if there is some reproduction on the latest Java SDK then we can reopen

title: INTERNAL: Panic! This is a bug! in wrapStartException
